MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30am to carry safe repair work to overhead line equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:15am on 17th April 2021.
